alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:56PM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 16 inches, except 1 to 2 feet above 6000 ft the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will create blowing snow. * WHERE...Boise Mountains zone. * WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may result in continuously covered roads, and snow will blow back on to the roads very soon after they are plowed..
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
